author: keepersway
content: Whats the estimated date to include EIP 1559 ?

author: timbeiko
content: <@!315499640722030592> this isn't the channel for this: it's for implementers to discuss the progress. ~~Will delete~~ Deleted your second message because it is really out of scope.

author: timbeiko
content: There is no timeline set, but the next potential fork after Berlin is likely to happen over the summer. 1559 could be included then, but it has not been confirmed.
